MAPSHARE_ID.description: The MapShare ID, found at explore.delorme.com in the 'Social' section.

DEVICE_IMEI.description: The IMEI of the device which will track your location.

REPORT_MMSI.description: The MMSI number of the vessel to be used in the self-report

REPORT_FROM.description: The FROM email address (sender) of the self-reports.

REPORT_TITLE.description: The email TITLE to be used in the seld-reports.
